title: Шрīла Бгакті Сундар Ґовінда Дев-Ґосва̄мī Маха̄ра̄дж

translation: “His Guru’s most cherished wishes, he’s truly fulfilling,<br class="SongVerse__break" />Adorned with his guru-varga’s affectionate blessing.<br class="SongVerse__break" />In knowledge both conceivable and inconceivable,<br class="SongVerse__break" />His expertise illumines the ontological whole.<br class="SongVerse__break" />He’s the foremost follower of Śrī Rūpa’s divine aim,<br class="SongVerse__break" />Śrī Bhakti Sundar Govinda is his celebrated name.<br class="SongVerse__break" />His beautiful figure stands out, clean, clear and effulgent,<br class="SongVerse__break" />Devotionally endowed with transcendent sentiment.<br class="SongVerse__break" />I worship him, the world-wide guru from high above,<br class="SongVerse__break" />The empowered bestower of the seed of Divine Love.”
